Megatron:




"Not as organized as I thought things would be," Megatron replied. "I was 
hoping on a truce. I would appreciate a relief from you and your troops. I 
am currently trying to reclaim my rein with the rest of the Predacons."

>::Zardus::
>
>Zardus laughs into his comm-link. "Yes... It went fine, the Maximals
>retreated. How are things at your base?"
>
>As long as Megatron was making conversation, Zardus might as well too.
>Sometimes important things could be found out through small talk.
